title: LOST IN SPACE  S01E01 - THE RELUCTANT STOWAWAY
description: First of all, I&#039;d like to dedicate this torrent to SOUNDTREKKER. Not only did he introduce me to the remastered Star Trek TOS, but also has uploaded Irwin Allen&#039;s "LAND OF THE GIANTS" AND "VOYAGE TO THE BOTTOM OF THE SEA", two staples of my childhood. Seeing these classics again made me think that Allen&#039;s trifecta would not be complete without my favorite, "LOST IN SPACE". Wracking my aging memory banks, I found a LIS file. Sadly, I have just one episode. But it&#039;s the first, in all its B&W glory. Wherein we are introduced to the Space Family Robinson, their loyal B9 robot, and the infamous comedic antihero Dr. Smith. Actually, he becomes the self-serving buffoon later. In the first, he&#039;s plain evil! ENJOY!
